meanings.sent1: The government legalized gambling in the city.
meanings.sent2: The new law legalized street food vendors in the downtown area.
meanings.sent3: The mayor legalized wearing pajamas to work on Fridays.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a superhero when she legalized the school dance.
meanings.sent5: The decision to legalize skateboarding in the park brought joy to many young people.

meanings.definition: Make (something that was previously illegal) permissible by law.
meanings.sent1: The state legalized the sale of marijuana for medical purposes.
meanings.sent2: The court legalized the use of certain fireworks in the county.
meanings.sent3: The town council legalized eating ice cream for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: Her smile legalized the once forbidden love affair.
meanings.sent5: The legislation to legalize street art sparked creativity in the community.
